page.title: 11Malmesbury Fire & Ambulance
page.content: {Malmesbury Fire Brigade}covers an area of 90 sq. miles in N.Wiltshire.They sometimes help in other areas. There are{ten part-time Firemen}employed, two of whom are{Ambulance men}as well. Each fireman is called on duty by a {Radio Pager}which he wears all the time except when he is at his full time work. At{Malmesbury Station}there is only one fire engine. The engine is mostly called out for chimney fires. The{Malmesbury Ambulance service covers 174 square miles.{11 Ambulance {drivers}are employed.They work 8 hour shifts.At the station there are 2 emergency ambulances, 1 dual purpose ambulance and 1 car.10% of their work is to answer emergency calls.Otherwise they take people to hospital, to out patients and attend accidents.Their least favourite calls are big car accidents on the motorway.
